meanings: [명사] rescue, help, [동사] rescue (sb from sth), save (sb from sth)

vlive.korean: 구조가 어떻게... 머리랑 다리밖에 없나요? The structure... Does it only have the head and the leg? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] SF9 x 우리의 밤 (Our Night with SF9)
vlive.english: The structure... Does it only have the head and the leg?

vlive.korean: 집 구조 바꾸기? Change the structure of my room? 듣기 View video 강다니엘 (KANG DANIEL) : 👋👋
vlive.english: Change the structure of my room?

vlive.korean: [힙합 구조] 장난 아니라고 디테일! [Hip hop rescue] The details are crazy! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.105
vlive.english: [Hip hop rescue] The details are crazy!

vlive.korean: 구조 바꾸기라고 해야 될까? 가구 바꾸기? Should I say changing the formation of the room? Move around furniture? 듣기 View video 강다니엘 (KANG DANIEL) : 👋👋
vlive.english: Should I say changing the formation of the room? Move around furniture?

vlive.korean: [어때] - 미쳤어요? - 제이홉 지금 힙합 구조대 같은데? [What do you think?] - Are you crazy? - j-hope looks like the hip hop rescue team. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.105
vlive.english: [What do you think?] - Are you crazy? - j-hope looks like the hip hop rescue team.

examples.korean: The exhausted climbers were rescued by helicopter. 발음듣기 탈진한 등산객들은 헬리콥터로 구조되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The exhausted climbers were rescued by helicopter. 발음

examples.korean: Ten fishermen were saved in a daring sea rescue. 발음듣기 과감한 해상 구조 작업으로 열 명의 어부가 목숨을 건졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Ten fishermen were saved in a daring sea rescue. 발음

examples.korean: Rescuers made heroic efforts to save the crew. 발음듣기 구조대원들은 그 승무원들을 구하기 위해 영웅적인 노력을 기울였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Rescuers made heroic efforts to save the crew. 발음

examples.korean: A helicopter was scrambled to help rescue three young climbers. 발음듣기 젊은 등반가 세 명의 구조를 돕기 위해 헬리콥터 한 대를 긴급 이륙시켰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A helicopter was scrambled to help rescue three young climbers. 발음

examples.korean: They climbed onto the upturned hull and waited to be rescued. 발음듣기 그들은 뒤집힌 선체 위로 기어 올라가서 구조를 기다렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They climbed onto the upturned hull and waited to be rescued. 발음
